channel.title: I used Auxy to create songs for a real video game
channel.description:
About a year ago, I got hooked up with this dev that was creating his own game called Roobound. He was a legit developer who had worked on games like Uncharted, and Dante‚Äôs Inferno.
Here‚Äôs a couple images from the game: ![image|281x500](upload://bDtW9uz6EbRyqOuePrQKFno7Pok.jpeg) ![image|281x500](upload://5eJTa78TrY8XXRdiPOvARXkoXSZ.jpeg)
I started creating demos with Auxy, and he‚Äôd pick which ones he liked, and I‚Äôd recreate the demos in Cubase.
I‚Äôm super proud of these songs. I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve ever worked harder on anything in my life.
I ended up creating 4 full length songs before he pulled the game because he got a job at Facebook.
Here are a couple of the songs. I‚Äôll post the rest if yall want to hear the others.
IN A POUCH https://www.dropbox.com/s/b5ew5smrd48y2x1/In%20a%20Pouch%20-%20%28Master%29.wav?dl=0
AUXY PROJECT: https://app.auxy.co/projects/9Mb1wpw0LsyarVjarb5VJw==
________________________________________________
TOUCHY TERMITES https://www.dropbox.com/s/rm7l5fuwga2vjma/Touchy%20Termites%20-%20%28Master%29.wav?dl=0
AUXY PROJECT: https://app.auxy.co/projects/x5dIlr3Uw4TF832K_HjHCA==
Funny thing about Touchy Termites - that was the random project name Auxy had created - he liked the name, so we kept it. It is also the one song that I used Auxy instruments in the final product.
Enjoy üëçüèª

item.title: I used Auxy to create songs for a real video game
item.dc:creator: YeahMarcYeah
item.description:
About a year ago, I got hooked up with this dev that was creating his own game called Roobound. He was a legit developer who had worked on games like Uncharted, and Dante‚Äôs Inferno.

Here‚Äôs a couple images from the game:

I started creating demos with Auxy, and he‚Äôd pick which ones he liked, and I‚Äôd recreate the demos in Cubase.

I‚Äôm super proud of these songs. I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve ever worked harder on anything in my life.

I ended up creating 4 full length songs before he pulled the game because he got a
job at Facebook.

Here are a couple of the songs. I‚Äôll post the rest if yall want to hear the others.

IN A POUCH

AUXY PROJECT: https://app.auxy.co/projects/9Mb1wpw0LsyarVjarb5VJw==

TOUCHY TERMITES

AUXY PROJECT: https://app.auxy.co/projects/x5dIlr3Uw4TF832K_HjHCA==

Funny thing about Touchy Termites - that was the random project name Auxy had created - he liked the name, so we kept it. It is also the one song that I used Auxy instruments in the final product.

Enjoy
